ai.summary: A gentle 3.6 km Blue route on the Botley Health Routes in the UK, designed for easy walkers seeking a relaxed circuit with accessible paths and local scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat or gently rolling paths with a mix of tarmac, compact gravel, and well-maintained trails. Some sections may be uneven or muddy after rain; suitable for beginners with appropriate footwear.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths and public rights of way. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a light rain layer. Check local conditions and daylight; start early in winter months. Carry water, a map or GPS, and let someone know your plan. Be mindful of cyclists or other pedestrians on shared sections.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or light hiking boots
Light weather-appropriate clothing and a layer
Light rain jacket or packable shell
Map or GPS device or fully charged phone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer and Autumn; winter walks are possible with extra layers and careful footing.

seo.title: Botley Health Routes Blue — Easy 3.6 km Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Botley Health Routes Blue, a gentle 3.6 km route in the UK. An easy walk suitable for families, with flat or rolling paths, safety tips and gear recommendations.
